titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C23

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0066__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0066.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 9<shi rend="underline"></shi><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0066__main__2"/> The creature finished speaking and fixed his <lb n="c57-0066__main__3"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0066__main__d3e13244"/>eyes<del eID="c57-0066__main__d3e13244"/>looks on me in expectation of a<mdel>n</mdel><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0066__main__d3e13256"/>answer<mdel>.</mdel><del eID="c57-0066__main__d3e13256"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>reply.<lb n="c57-0066__main__4"/> But I was bewilde<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0066__main__d3e13274"/>r<del eID="c57-0066__main__d3e13274"/>red & perplexed & unable <lb n="c57-0066__main__5"/> to arrange my ideas sufficiently to under<lb n="c57-0066__main__6"/>stand the meaning of his proposition. He <lb n="c57-0066__main__7"/> continued.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0066__main__8"/> You must create a female for <lb n="c57-0066__main__9"/> me with whom I can live in the <lb n="c57-0066__main__10"/> interchange of those sympathies necessary <lb n="c57-0066__main__11"/> for my being<mdel>–</mdel>; This you alone can do &<lb n="c57-0066__main__12"/> I demand of you as a right which you <lb n="c57-0066__main__13"/> must not refuse.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0066__main__14"/> As he said this I could no longer suppress <lb n="c57-0066__main__15"/> the anger that burned within me. I do <lb n="c57-0066__main__16"/> refuse it, I replied, & no torture shall ever <lb n="c57-0066__main__17"/> extort a consent from me – You may <lb n="c57-0066__main__18"/> render me the most miserable of men <lb n="c57-0066__main__19"/> but you shall never make me base <lb n="c57-0066__main__20"/> in my own eyes. Shall I create another like <lb n="c57-0066__main__21"/> yourself whose joint wickedness would <lb n="c57-0066__main__22"/> desolate the world? Begone –I have answer<lb n="c57-0066__main__23"/>ed you – You may kill me but I will <lb n="c57-0066__main__24"/> never consent.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0066__main__25"/> You are in the wrong, replied he, &<lb n="c57-0066__main__26"/> instead of threatening I am content to reason <lb n="c57-0066__main__27"/> with you. I am <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0066__main__d3e13352"/>wick<del eID="c57-0066__main__d3e13352"/> malicious, because <lb n="c57-0066__main__28"/> I am miserable. Am I not shunned &<lb n="c57-0066__main__29"/> hated by all mankind? You my creator <lb n="c57-0066__main__30"/> would tear me to pieces & triumph –Rem<lb n="c57-0066__main__31"/>ember that & tell me why I should pity <lb n="c57-0066__main__32"/> man more than he pities me. You <lb n="c57-0066__main__33"/> would not call it murder if you preci<lb n="c57-0066__main__34"/>pitated me into one of those ice rifts &<lb n="c57-0066__main__35"/> destroyed my frame, the work of your <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>own hands. <lb n="c57-0066__main__36"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0066__main__d3e13395"/>And<del eID="c57-0066__main__d3e13395"/> shall I respect man when hecon-<lb n="c57-0066__main__37"/>temns me? Let him live with me in <lb n="c57-0066__main__38"/> the interchange of kindness and instead of<lb n="c57-0067__main__1"/> injury I would bestow every benefit upon him with <lb n="c57-0067__main__2"/> tears of gratitude at his acceptance. But <lb n="c57-0067__main__3"/> that cannot be; <mdel>T</mdel>the human senses are <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0067__main__d3e13437"/>an<del eID="c57-0067__main__d3e13437"/><lb n="c57-0067__main__4"/> insurmountable barriers to our union. <lb n="c57-0067__main__5"/> But mine shall not the submission of abject <lb n="c57-0067__main__6"/> slavery. I will revenge my injuries <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0067__main__d3e13446"/>&<del eID="c57-0067__main__d3e13446"/> if I <lb n="c57-0067__main__7"/> cannot inspire love I will cause fear <lb n="c57-0067__main__8"/> and chiefly towards you my arch-enemy because <lb n="c57-0067__main__9"/> my creator; <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0067__main__d3e13459"/>I w<del eID="c57-0067__main__d3e13459"/> do I swear <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0067__main__d3e13464"/>unutterable<del eID="c57-0067__main__d3e13464"/>inextinguishable<lb n="c57-0067__main__10"/> hatred– I will work & destroy nor finish <lb n="c57-0067__main__11"/> untill I desolate your heart so that you <lb n="c57-0067__main__12"/> curse the hour of your birth." A fiend <lb n="c57-0067__main__13"/> -ish rage animated him as he said <lb n="c57-0067__main__14"/> this; his face was wrinkled into contortions <lb n="c57-0067__main__15"/> too horrible for human eyes to behold; <lb n="c57-0067__main__16"/> but presently he calmed himself, &<lb n="c57-0067__main__17"/> proceeded.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0067__main__18"/> I intended to reason. This passion <lb n="c57-0067__main__19"/> is detrimental to me, for you do not <lb n="c57-0067__main__20"/> reflect that you are the <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sole cause <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of its excesses.. If <lb n="c57-0067__main__21"/> any being felt emotions of benevolence <lb n="c57-0067__main__22"/> towards me I should return then an <lb n="c57-0067__main__23"/> hundred & a hundred fold; for that <lb n="c57-0067__main__24"/> one creature's sake I would make peace <lb n="c57-0067__main__25"/> with the whole kind– But I now indulge <lb n="c57-0067__main__26"/> in dreams <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of bliss that cannot be realized. What <lb n="c57-0067__main__27"/> I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0067__main__d3e13552"/>a<del eID="c57-0067__main__d3e13552"/>ask of you is reasonable and moderate. <lb n="c57-0067__main__28"/> I demand a creature of another sex but <lb n="c57-0067__main__29"/> as hideous as myself. The gratification is <lb n="c57-0067__main__30"/> small but it is all that I can receive <lb n="c57-0067__main__31"/> and it shall content me. It is true we <lb n="c57-0067__main__32"/> shall be monsters cut off from all <lb n="c57-0067__main__33"/> the world but on that account we <lb n="c57-0067__main__34"/> shall be more attached to one another <lb n="c57-0067__main__35"/> Our lives will not be happy but they <lb n="c57-0067__main__36"/> will be harmless & free from the misery <lb n="c57-0067__main__37"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0067__main__d3e13582"/>that<del eID="c57-0067__main__d3e13582"/>which I now feel. Oh! my creator make<lb n="c57-0068__main__1"/><lb n="c57-0068__left_margin__1"/>me happy–,let me feel gratitude towards you for one <lb n="c57-0068__main__2"/> benefit; Let me see that I excite the <lb n="c57-0068__main__3"/> sympathy of <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>one creature. Do not deny me my <lb n="c57-0068__main__4"/> request.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0068__main__5"/> I was moved. I shuddered when I thought <lb n="c57-0068__main__6"/> of the possible consequences of my consent <lb n="c57-0068__main__7"/> but I felt that there was some justice <lb n="c57-0068__main__8"/> in his argument. His tale and the fee<lb n="c57-0068__main__9"/>lings he now expressed <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0068__main__d3e13651"/>ap<del eID="c57-0068__main__d3e13651"/>proved him to <lb n="c57-0068__main__10"/> be a creature of fine sensations and <lb n="c57-0068__main__11"/> did not I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as his <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0068__main__d3e13671"/>creator<del eID="c57-0068__main__d3e13671"/> maker owe him <lb n="c57-0068__main__12"/> all the portion of happiness that it <lb n="c57-0068__main__13"/> was in <mdel>pw</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my power to bestow? He saw my <lb n="c57-0068__main__14"/> change of feeling & continued.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0068__main__15"/> If you consent neither you or <lb n="c57-0068__main__16"/> any human <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0068__main__d3e13702"/>being<del eID="c57-0068__main__d3e13702"/> creature shall ever see <lb n="c57-0068__main__17"/> us again. I will go to the vast wilds of <lb n="c57-0068__main__18"/> America. My food is not that of man; I <lb n="c57-0068__main__19"/> do not destroy the lamb or the kid to <lb n="c57-0068__main__20"/> glut my appetite. Acorns & berries afford <lb n="c57-0068__main__21"/> me sufficient nourishment. My com<lb n="c57-0068__main__22"/>panion will be of the same nature <lb n="c57-0068__main__23"/> as myself and will be content with <lb n="c57-0068__main__24"/> the same fare. We shall make our bed <lb n="c57-0068__main__25"/> of dried leaves; the sun will shine on <lb n="c57-0068__main__26"/> us as on man & will ripen our food. You <lb n="c57-0068__main__27"/> are moved. The picture I present to you <lb n="c57-0068__main__28"/> is peaceful & human and you must <lb n="c57-0068__main__29"/> feel that you could deny it only in <lb n="c57-0068__main__30"/> the wantoness of power & cruelty. Pitiless <lb n="c57-0068__main__31"/> as you are towards me I see compassi<lb n="c57-0068__main__32"/>on in your eyes. Let me seize the <lb n="c57-0068__main__33"/> favourable moment &<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0068__main__d3e13751"/>pro<del eID="c57-0068__main__d3e13751"/> persuade <lb n="c57-0068__main__34"/> you to promise what I so ardently <lb n="c57-0068__main__35"/> desire.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0068__main__36"/> You promise, replied I, to quit the habitations<lb n="c57-0069__main__1"/> of man and to inhabit those wilds where <lb n="c57-0069__main__2"/> the beasts of the field will be your only co<mdel>n</mdel>m<lb n="c57-0069__main__3"/>panions. How can you who long for the love <lb n="c57-0069__main__4"/>& sympathy of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13796"/>human being<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13796"/><mdel>s</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>man persevere in <lb n="c57-0069__main__5"/> this exile? You will return and seek <lb n="c57-0069__main__6"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13816"/>for<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13816"/> their kindness & you will meet their <lb n="c57-0069__main__7"/> detestation; your evil <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13822"/>w<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13822"/> passions will <lb n="c57-0069__main__8"/> be renewed, & you will then have <lb n="c57-0069__main__9"/> a companion to aid you in your <lb n="c57-0069__main__10"/> task of destruction. Begone; I cannot <lb n="c57-0069__main__11"/> consent.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0069__main__12"/> The Monster replied with fervour, <lb n="c57-0069__main__13"/> How inconstant are your feelings; but <lb n="c57-0069__main__14"/> a moment ago you were moved by <lb n="c57-0069__main__15"/> my representations, & why do you again <lb n="c57-0069__main__16"/> harden yourself to my complaints? I <lb n="c57-0069__main__17"/> swear by the earth which I inhabit <lb n="c57-0069__main__18"/>& by you that made me that with <lb n="c57-0069__main__19"/> the companion you bestow I will <lb n="c57-0069__main__20"/> quit the neighbourhood of man &<lb n="c57-0069__main__21"/> dwell, as it may chance, in the <lb n="c57-0069__main__22"/> most savage <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13860"/>of<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13860"/> places. My evil <lb n="c57-0069__main__23"/> passions will have fled, for I shall <lb n="c57-0069__main__24"/> meet with sympathy. My life will <lb n="c57-0069__main__25"/> flow quietly away & in my dying <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13869"/>momen<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13869"/><lb n="c57-0069__main__26"/> moments I shall not curse my <lb n="c57-0069__main__27"/> maker.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0069__main__28"/> His words had a strange effect <lb n="c57-0069__main__29"/> upon me. I compassionated him &<lb n="c57-0069__main__30"/> sometimes felt a wish to console him <lb n="c57-0069__main__31"/> but when I looked on him when I saw <lb n="c57-0069__main__32"/> the filthy mass that moved & talked <lb n="c57-0069__main__33"/> my heart sickend & my feelings were <lb n="c57-0069__main__34"/> altered to <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>those horror & hatred. I tried to <lb n="c57-0069__main__35"/> stifle them I thought that as I could <lb n="c57-0069__main__36"/> not <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13913"/>comfort<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13913"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13922"/>sympathize<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13922"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13929"/>him I h<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13929"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0069__main__d3e13932"/>sympo<del eID="c57-0069__main__d3e13932"/>sympa<lb n="c57-0070__main__1"/>thize with him I had no right to refuse him <lb n="c57-0070__main__2"/> the small portion of happiness that I had it <lb n="c57-0070__main__3"/> in my power to bestow. <mdel>I</mdel>You swear, I said, to <lb n="c57-0070__main__4"/> be harmless but have you not already shown <lb n="c57-0070__main__5"/> a degree of malise that would reasonably <lb n="c57-0070__main__6"/> make me distrust you? May not even this <lb n="c57-0070__main__7"/> be a feint that will encrease your triumph <lb n="c57-0070__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e13979"/>& desire of revenge<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e13979"/>by affording a wider scope to your revenge.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0070__main__9"/> How is this, cried he; I thought I had moved <lb n="c57-0070__main__10"/> your compassion, and yet you still refuse to <lb n="c57-0070__main__11"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e13996"/>give<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e13996"/><lb n="c57-0070__left_margin__1"/>bestow on me the only benefit that can soften my <lb n="c57-0070__main__12"/> heart and render me harmless. If I <lb n="c57-0070__main__13"/> have no ties & no affections hatred & vice <lb n="c57-0070__main__14"/> must be my portion. The love of another <lb n="c57-0070__main__15"/> will destroy the cause of my crimes & I shall <lb n="c57-0070__main__16"/> become a thing of whose existence every <lb n="c57-0070__main__17"/> one will be ignorant. My vices are <lb n="c57-0070__main__18"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14029"/>ch<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14029"/> the children of <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a forced solitude that I <lb n="c57-0070__main__19"/> abhor and my virtues will necessarily arise <lb n="c57-0070__main__20"/> when <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14049"/>sh<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14049"/> I shall receive the sympathy of an equal. <lb n="c57-0070__main__21"/> I shall feel <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14062"/>human<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14062"/>the<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14069"/>sy<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14069"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14072"/>f<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14072"/> affections <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of a living being&<lb n="c57-0070__main__22"/> become linked to the chain of existence <lb n="c57-0070__main__23"/>& events from which I am now excluded<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0070__main__24"/> I paused some time <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to reflect on all <lb n="c57-0070__main__25"/> he had related and the various arguments <lb n="c57-0070__main__26"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14115"/>that<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14115"/><lb n="c57-0070__left_margin__1"/>which he had <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14131"/>used<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14131"/>employed. I thought of pro<lb n="c57-0070__main__27"/>mises& threats the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14151"/>various<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14151"/>promise of virtues which he <lb n="c57-0070__main__28"/> had displayed on the opening of his exis<lb n="c57-0070__main__29"/><lb n="c57-0070__left_margin__1"/>tence; and th<del rend="overwritten" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14179"/>eir<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14179"/>e subsequent blight <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14186"/>caused by<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14186"/>of all<lb n="c57-0070__main__30"/>kindly feelings by the detestation & horror <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0070__main__d3e14202"/>that his<del eID="c57-0070__main__d3e14202"/>inspired by<lb n="c57-0070__main__31"/> protectors had manifested towards <lb n="c57-0070__main__32"/> him. His power & threats were not <lb n="c57-0070__main__33"/> ommitted in my calculations; a crea<lb n="c57-0070__main__34"/>ture who could exist among the ice caves <lb n="c57-0070__main__35"/> of the glaciers & hide himself from per<lb n="c57-0070__main__36"/>suit in the ridges inaccessible precepieces was<lb n="c57-0071__main__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14244"/>a powerful <shi rend="underline">cre</shi> being.<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14244"/> was a being poss<lb n="c57-0071__main__2"/>essing faculties it would be vain to cope <lb n="c57-0071__main__3"/> with; <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14259"/>I thought<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14259"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14262"/>And<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14262"/><mdel>a</mdel>After a long pause <lb n="c57-0071__main__4"/> of reflection I concluded that the justice <lb n="c57-0071__main__5"/> due both to him & my <mdel/>fellow creatures <lb n="c57-0071__main__6"/> demanded of me that I should comply <lb n="c57-0071__main__7"/> with his request. Turning to him <lb n="c57-0071__main__8"/> therefore I said.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0071__main__9"/> I consent to your demand on <lb n="c57-0071__main__10"/> you solemn oath to quit Europe &<lb n="c57-0071__main__11"/> every other place in the neighbourhood <lb n="c57-0071__main__12"/> of mam as soon as I shall deliver <lb n="c57-0071__main__13"/> into you hands a female who is to <lb n="c57-0071__main__14"/> accompany you in your exile.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0071__main__15"/> I swear, he cried, by the sun & by <lb n="c57-0071__main__16"/> the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14321"/>clouds<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14321"/>blue sky of heaven that while they exist you <lb n="c57-0071__main__17"/> shall never behold me. Depart <lb n="c57-0071__main__18"/> then to your home & commence <lb n="c57-0071__main__19"/> your labours. I shall <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14335"/>th<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14335"/> watch <lb n="c57-0071__main__20"/> their progress with <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14340"/>utt<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14340"/> unutterable <lb n="c57-0071__main__21"/> anxiety and fear not but that when <lb n="c57-0071__main__22"/> you are ready for me but that I shall appear.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0071__main__23"/> Saying this he suddenly quitted me <lb n="c57-0071__main__24"/> fearful perhaps of any change in <lb n="c57-0071__main__25"/> my sentiments. I saw him descend <lb n="c57-0071__main__26"/> the mountain with greater speed than <lb n="c57-0071__main__27"/> the flight of the eagle and quickly lost <lb n="c57-0071__main__28"/> him among the undulations of the <lb n="c57-0071__main__29"/> sea of ice.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0071__main__30"/> His tale had occupied the whole day <lb n="c57-0071__main__31"/> and the sun was upon the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0071__main__d3e14377"/>ve<del eID="c57-0071__main__d3e14377"/> verge <lb n="c57-0071__main__32"/> of the horizon when he departed. I knew <lb n="c57-0071__main__33"/> that I ought to hasten to descend to the <lb n="c57-0071__main__34"/> valley as I should soon be encompassed<lb n="c57-0072__main__1"/> in darkness. But my heart was heavy, and <lb n="c57-0072__main__2"/> my steps slow. The labour of winding a<lb n="c57-0072__main__3"/>mong the little paths and fixing my feet <lb n="c57-0072__main__4"/> firmly <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14408"/>a<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14408"/> as I advanced teazed me occupied <lb n="c57-0072__main__5"/> as I was by the feelings <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14425"/>that<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14425"/>which the occurences of the <lb n="c57-0072__main__6"/> day had produced. It had long been night <lb n="c57-0072__main__7"/> when I came to the half way resting place <lb n="c57-0072__main__8"/>& seated myself beside the fountain. The stars <lb n="c57-0072__main__9"/> shone at intervals as the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14443"/>dark<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14443"/> clouds passed <lb n="c57-0072__main__10"/> from over them — The dark pines rose <lb n="c57-0072__main__11"/> before me & every here and there a broken <lb n="c57-0072__main__12"/> tree lay <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14456"/>listless<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14456"/><mdel>of</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>on the ground; it was <lb n="c57-0072__main__13"/> a scene of wonderful solemnity &moved <lb n="c57-0072__main__14"/> me stirred strange thoughts within <lb n="c57-0072__main__15"/> me. I wept bitterly and clasping my <lb n="c57-0072__main__16"/> hands in agony I exclaimed— Oh stars, <lb n="c57-0072__main__17"/><lb n="c57-0072__left_margin__1"/>& clouds, and wind ye are all about <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14500"/>ye<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14500"/> to mock <lb n="c57-0072__main__18"/> me — If ye really pity crush me but if <lb n="c57-0072__main__19"/> not depart depart & leave <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me to darkness. <lb n="c57-0072__main__20"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14521"/>Wild<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14521"/> These were wild & miserable thoughts <lb n="c57-0072__main__21"/> but I cannot describe to you how the <lb n="c57-0072__main__22"/> eternal twinkling of stars weighed upon <lb n="c57-0072__main__23"/> me, and I listened to every blast of wind <lb n="c57-0072__main__24"/> as it were a dull ugly siroc<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14533"/>k<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14533"/> on its way <lb n="c57-0072__main__25"/> to consume me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0072__main__26"/> It was morning before I arrived at <lb n="c57-0072__main__27"/> the village of Chamounix — but my presence <lb n="c57-0072__main__28"/> so haggard & strange hardly calmed the <lb n="c57-0072__main__29"/> fears of my family who had waited the <lb n="c57-0072__main__30"/> whole night in anxious expectation of <lb n="c57-0072__main__31"/> my return. What could I say to them <lb n="c57-0072__main__32"/> or how account for my disappearance <lb n="c57-0072__main__33"/> and present miser<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0072__main__34"/> The following day we returned to Geneva. <lb n="c57-0072__main__35"/> The <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0072__main__d3e14569"/>purpos<del eID="c57-0072__main__d3e14569"/> intention of my father in<lb n="c57-0073__main__1"/> coming had been to divert my mind & to restore <lb n="c57-0073__main__2"/> to me my lost tranquillity. But the medecine <lb n="c57-0073__main__3"/> had been fatal & unable to account <lb n="c57-0073__main__4"/> for the excess of misery I appeared to <lb n="c57-0073__main__5"/> suffer he hastened to return home <lb n="c57-0073__main__6"/> hoping that the quiet & calm of a domestic <lb n="c57-0073__main__7"/> life would by degrees alleviate my suf<lb n="c57-0073__main__8"/>ferings from whatsoever cause they <lb n="c57-0073__main__9"/> might spring.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0073__main__10"/> For myself I was passive in all <lb n="c57-0073__main__11"/> their arrangements, and the gentle <lb n="c57-0073__main__12"/> affection of my beloved Elizabeth was <lb n="c57-0073__main__13"/> inadequate to draw me from the <lb n="c57-0073__main__14"/> depth of my despair. The promise I <lb n="c57-0073__main__15"/> had made to the dæmon weighed <lb n="c57-0073__main__16"/> upon my mind like Dante's iron <lb n="c57-0073__main__17"/> cowl on the head of the hellish hypo<lb n="c57-0073__main__18"/>crites. all pleasures of earth or sky <lb n="c57-0073__main__19"/> passed before me as a dream & that <lb n="c57-0073__main__20"/> one thought only had to me the <lb n="c57-0073__main__21"/> reality of life. Can you wonder that <lb n="c57-0073__main__22"/> sometimes a kind of insanity possessed <lb n="c57-0073__main__23"/> me or that I saw about me a <lb n="c57-0073__main__24"/> multitude of filthy animals inflic<lb n="c57-0073__main__25"/>ting on me incessant torture that <lb n="c57-0073__main__26"/> often extorted <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0073__main__d3e14654"/>from<del eID="c57-0073__main__d3e14654"/> screams &<lb n="c57-0073__main__27"/> bitter groans.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0073__main__28"/> By degrees however these <lb n="c57-0073__main__29"/> feelings became calmed. I entered <lb n="c57-0073__main__30"/> again into the every day of life if <lb n="c57-0073__main__31"/> not with interrest at least with <lb n="c57-0073__main__32"/> some degree of tranquillity.
